price: 41. Edde luk Jibriil gibdi xongoloo kee caacayay cakkil keenil rubnet ken finqisne, tokkel weeqi baahe buura ken abne, tokkel daalimiinih yan maray koroosite Yalli ken finqisay isi Racmatak mayxaarah ken yayxaaray!
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ غُثَآءٗۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣayḥatu bil-ḥaqi fajaʿalnāhum ghuthāan fabuʿ'dan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
